swiper轮播-异形

swiper轮播效果(默认):

var mySwiper = new Swiper(".swiper1", {
    slidesPerView: 2, //个数
    spaceBetween: 20, //间距
    centeredSlides: true, //居中
    loop : true //环路
});

swiper轮播效果(异形):(主要区别在样式,js基本不需要改动)

.swiper-slide {
    transition: 300ms;
    transform: scale(0.8);
}

.swiper-slide-active,
.swiper-slide-duplicate-active {
    transform: scale(1);
}

var swiper = new Swiper('.swiper2', {
    slidesPerView: 2,
    spaceBetween: 20,
    centeredSlides: true,
    loop: true
});

swiper轮播效果(异形):(主要区别在样式,js基本不需要改动)

.swiper3 .swiper-slide {
    transition: 300ms;
    transform: scale(0.9);
}

.swiper3 .swiper-slide-active,
.swiper3 .swiper-slide-duplicate-active {
    transform: scale(1);
    z-index: 9;
}

var swiper = new Swiper('.swiper3', {
    slidesPerView: 2,
    spaceBetween: -30,
    centeredSlides: true,
    loop: true
});

swiper轮播效果(异形):(主要区别在样式,js基本不需要改动)

.swiper4 .swiper-slide {
    transition: 300ms;
    transform: scale(0.8);
}
                        
.swiper4 .swiper-slide-prev,
.swiper4 .swiper-slide-next {
    transform: scale(0.9);
    z-index: 9;
}
                        
.swiper4 .swiper-slide-active,
.swiper4 .swiper-slide-duplicate-active {
    transform: scale(1);
    z-index:
var swiper = new Swiper('.swiper4', {
    slidesPerView: 4,
    spaceBetween: -30,
    centeredSlides: true,
    loop: true
});

注:考虑到transform容易引起图片失真,并不建议使用,可以尝试其他方式,例如:使用动画效果修改图片width,且图片居中显示高度自适应.

另(可能较常使用的参数):
  init: false, //初始化
  slidesPerView: 2.5, //个数
  spaceBetween: -50, //间距
  centeredSlides: false, //居中
  loop: true, //环路
  loopedSlides: 3, //loop个数
  speed: 300, //速度
  autoplay: { //自动轮播
      delay: 3000, //轮播速度
      disableOnInteraction: false, //用户滑动后是否自动轮播
  },
  freeMode: false, //滑动时只滑动一格,切自动贴合
  followFinger: false, //是否跟随手指
  touchRatio: 0.2, //触摸变慢
  preventInteractionOnTransition: true, //过渡时是否滑动
  preventClicks: true, //触摸时阻止默认事件
  preventClicksPropagation: true, //阻止click冒泡
  preventInteractionOnTransition: true, //过渡时无法滑动
  observer: true,// 修改swiper或子元素时，自动初始化
  observeParents: false,// 修改swiper的父元素时，自动初始化
  on: { //监听
      SlideChangeTransitionEnd: function () {}, //回调函数，swiper从一个slide过渡到另一个slide结束时执行。
  }
  onSlideChangeEnd: function (swiper) { //旧版本,另一种写法
      swiper.update();
  }

  mySwiper.appendSlide([html]); //新增slide,html内容为一个slide
  mySwiper.removeSlide([0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5]); //移除slide块,[]内容为要移除的slide的index
